data.name: Save Me, Sakuya-san!: Remilia Scarlet's Coin And Glass Game.
data.detailed_description:
STORY

A light hearted continuation of Save Me, Sakuya-san! With Sakuya gone to resolve an incident, Remilia Scarlet finally decides to pay you a visit with an offer you can't refuse! Beat her in a simple game involving a glass of "wine" and some coins, and she'll change your fate to whatever you see fit. Of course, this is a lot easier said then done!

FEATURES

  • Multiple Endings!
  • Challenging Gameplay!
  • Riveting Dialogue!
  • Immersive Soundtrack!

data.short_description: With Sakuya gone, Remilia Scarlet takes over and pays you a visit with an offer you can't refuse in this precision based visual novel with challenging gameplay and multiple endings! Your fate literally rests on your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated HD Graphics
